name: Bitch demon twins
description:
A short mini-game that can be cleared in 10 minutes


Short sketch action game. Even if it dies, as long as it is parasitized again, it can stand up no matter how many times. The two arrogant brats are not human at all. Simply invincible! The plot is available in Chinese and Japanese
Manipulating parasitic plant twins to find mother
Switch roles to perform different attacks


operate:
Move Left (←)
Move right (→)
jump (↑)

attack (Z)
Role switching (A)
